items.name: Leanne
items.text: The guys were professional, respectful, and absolutely stunning. They made my bachelorette party unforgettable!

items.name: Megan
items.text: Best entertainment we've ever had at a corporate event. The team was punctual, professional, and incredibly talented.

items.name: Sam
items.text: Hired topless waiters for our girls night and it was perfect! They were charming, fun, and made everyone feel comfortable.
